content.rendered:
We offer comprehensive services for entrepreneurs looking to establish their business as a Limited Liability Partnership (LLP). Our team is dedicated to providing the support and expertise you need to navigate the process smoothly and successfully.

Our package price includes professional fees and government fees, but the stamp duty for the LLP Agreement is not included as it varies by state.

Here’s a breakdown of the procedure involved:

  1. Checking name availability
  2. Preparation of necessary document
  3. Filing Fillip form with MCA
  4. Preparation of LLP agreement
  5. Filling of FORM 3 with MCA

Get ready to embark on your entrepreneurial adventure. All the best, hustler! And give OKStartups an opportunity be a part of your entrepreneurial journey to success.

excerpt.rendered: Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) is a modern form of business that is a combination of a company and a partnership firm. While it has the advantages and features of a private limited company, it can be operated flexibly just like a normal partnership.
